reviewText: Jamaica Inn is missing from the DVD. However Captain Kidd and Long John Silvers Return to Treasure Island make it worth it. Charles Laughton as Captain Kidd is a classic. Robert Newton as Long John Silver in my book is as good as Johnny Depp or even better as a pirate. Even though Jamaica Inn is missing it is still worth owning. Don't think a lot of folks appreciate a lot of the old classics and actors.
Not the Bobby Driscoll version, a big yawn.  Should be marketed as a PBS documentary and B movie from the 50s.
